TopicTitle: Kerbals go splat not poof mod

Articles.Content:
I have thought this for a long time that Kerbals should go splat when litho breaking too hard. Simple idea may not be simple thing to code, I have no clue just putting the suggestion oh there. Things that go splat are way more fun than things that go poof in silence. 

Mmm could flags possibly be converted into splat Kerbal remains?

My absolute favorite unimplemented KSP idea is for Kerbals to pop like popcorn when they overheat, either from reentry or getting too close to their sun.

/Not my idea. If someone implements it, I'll look up who originally thought of the idea for proper credit. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

It would be interesting to see a Kerbal to suddenly pop during an overheat event and a green kerbal sized popcorn (represented as a debris) replace him/her... Perhaps adding this

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/0bZ0KFbNzuM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 somewhat before a kerbal pop would be an interesting in-game warning.
